entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Monday 3 April 2023
